environment.setup_command: ls third_party/WebShop/data/items_shuffle_1000.json third_party/WebShop/data/items_ins_v2_1000.json third_party/WebShop/data/items_human_ins.json && source venv/bin/activate && python -c 'from src.env.webshop import create_webshop_env; from src.env.base import Action; env=create_webshop_env({"max_steps":80,"num_products":1000,"observation_mode":"text"}); obs,_=env.reset(task_id="0"); step=env.step(Action(action_type="search", args={"query":"water bottle"})); print(len(obs.text),step.reward,step.done)'
